attributes.action: Not to hold a 2nd Referendum on leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned, would like the government not to hold a 2nd referendum on leaving the EU based on the 60% of a 75% turnout as the majority who have already voted to leave the EU would never get their wish, thus ending our democracy.
attributes.background: We the undersigned, would like the government NOT to hold a 2nd referendum on leaving the EU based on the 60% of a 75% turnout, as the majority who have already voted to leave the EU would never get their wish. Thus adopting this ruling would be undemocratic.
